subtests.name: Constructing a CSSOKLab with percent for the lightness works as intended.
CSSOKLab.l can be updated with a percent.
Constructing a CSSOKLab with number for the lightness works as intended.
CSSOKLab.l can be updated with a number.
Constructing a CSSOKLab with css pixels for lightness throws a SyntaxError.
Constructing a CSSOKLab with degrees for lightness throws a SyntaxError.
CSSOKLab can be constructed from three numbers and will get an alpha of 100%.
CSSOKLab can be constructed from four numbers.
Constructing a CSSOKLab with CSS.number for l or alpha throws a SyntaxError
Updating a CSSOKLab with CSS.number for l throws a SyntaxError
CSSOKLab.l can be updated to a number.
CSSOKLab.l can be updated with a CSS percent.
Updating a CSSOKLab with CSS.number for alpha throws a SyntaxError
CSSOKLab.alpha can be updated to a number.
CSSOKLab.alpha can be updated with a CSS percent.
